analysis: The project requires UI improvements to match the Egyptian-themed, light color palette, desert-inspired, mobile-responsive, and clean design. The existing to-dos indicate that the mobile menu functionality and CSS styling need updates. The buttons also need to be checked for functionality.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with an Egyptian-themed color palette using light desert tones such as sandy beige, warm gold, and soft terracotta. Add Egyptian-inspired patterns and textures to enhance the theme.
Ensure all buttons in the HTML file are functional and styled according to the Egyptian theme. Add hover effects and smooth transitions for better user interaction.
Fix the mobile menu toggle functionality by implementing proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions. Ensure the hamburger icon works correctly on mobile devices.
